Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1984...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1987, off Mike LaCoss (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/1987, off Scott McGregor (ATL)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1987...
Hit for the cycle against Atlanta on 6/10/1988...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1989, hitting .391 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Houston on 8/8/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1989, hitting .560 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 8/21/1989 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1989...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against New York (N) on 8/18/1990...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1990...
Injured on 6/19/1991 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1991...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1992...
Drove in 7 runs against New York (N) on 7/17/1993...
